summary.span: 表示通过以迭代方式将正则表达式模式应用于输入字符串所找到的成功匹配的集合。

span.span: Represents the set of successful matches found by iteratively applying a regular expression pattern to the input string.

summary.span: 该集合是不可变的（只读），没有公共构造函数。

span.span: The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor.

summary.span: 方法返回 对象。

span.span: The method returns a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该集合是不可变的（只读），没有公共构造函数。The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor. 方法返回 对象。The method returns a object. 集合包含零个或多个 对象。The collection contains zero or more objects. 如果匹配成功，则会用输入字符串中找到的每个匹配项的一个 对象填充集合。If the match is successful, the collection is populated with one object for each match found in the input string. 如果匹配不成功，则集合不包含任何 对象，其 属性等于零。If the match is unsuccessful, the collection contains no objects, and its property equals zero. 在将正则表达式模式应用于特定输入字符串时，正则表达式引擎使用两种方法之一来生成 对象：When applying a regular expression pattern to a particular input string, the regular expression engine uses either of two techniques to build the object: - 直接计算。Direct evaluation. 对象同时填充，并且所有匹配都是由对 方法的特定调用导致的。The object is populated all at once, with all matches resulting from a particular call to the method. 当访问集合的 属性时，将使用此方法。This technique is used when the collection's property is accessed. 它通常是填充集合的更昂贵方法，并需要更高的性能。It typically is the more expensive method of populating the collection and entails a greater performance hit. - 迟缓计算。Lazy evaluation. 对象根据需要按匹配项进行填充。The object is populated as needed on a match-by-match basis. 它等效于正则表达式引擎重复调用 方法，并向集合添加每个匹配项。It is equivalent to the regular expression engine calling the method repeatedly and adding each match to the collection. 当通过其 方法访问集合，或者使用 `foreach` 语句（在中C#）或 `For Each`...`Next` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中）访问集合时，将使用此方法。This technique is used when the collection is accessed through its method, or when it is accessed using the `foreach` statement (in C#) or the `For Each`...`Next` statement (in Visual Basic). 若要循环访问集合的成员，应使用语言提供的集合迭代构造（如中C#的 `foreach` 和 `For Each`...`Next`To iterate through the members of the collection, you should use the collection iteration construct provided by your language (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中），而不是检索 方法返回的枚举器。in Visual Basic) instead of retrieving the enumerator that is returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类来询问一组 实例。The following example illustrates the use of the class to interrogate a set of instances. [!code-cpp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CPP/words.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CS/words.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/VB/words.vb#0)]

span.span: The array the collection is to be copied into.

param.name: arrayIndex
param.span: 数组中开始复制的位置。

span.span: The position in the array where copying is to begin.

summary.span: 从给定索引处开始将集合的所有元素复制到给定数组。

span.span: Copies all the elements of the collection to the given array starting at the given index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于集合从给定索引处开始复制到数组中，因此目标数组的大小必须至少为整个集合。Because the collection is copied into the array starting at the given index, the destination array must be at least as large as the entire collection. > [!WARNING] > [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]中不存在此成员。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果要开发面向 [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]的应用程序，请改用 方法。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the method instead. 由于 对象通常是使用延迟计算填充的，因此尝试在它完全填充之前复制集合可能会引发 异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to copy the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值有效，且查找单个匹配项的尝试超过该超时间隔，则会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: is a multi-dimensional array.
is outside the bounds of .
-or-

exception.span: 以及 在 的界限外。

span.span: plus is outside the bounds of .
A time-out occurred.

member this.Count : int

summary.span: 获取匹配项的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of matches.
The number of matches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过检索集合的 属性的值来访问 对象的各个成员会导致正则表达式引擎使用直接求值填充该集合。Accessing individual members of the object by retrieving the value of the collection's property causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection using direct evaluation. ln 比较：调用 方法（或使用中C#的 `foreach` 语句和 Visual Basic 中的 `For Each`...`Next` 语句）会导致正则表达式引擎使用延迟计算根据需要填充集合。ln contrast, calling the method (or using the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 直接评估与延迟计算相比，生成集合的方法开销要大得多。Direct evaluation can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 由于 对象通常是使用延迟计算来填充的，因此，尝试在已完全填充集合之前确定集合中元素的数目可能会引发 异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to determine the number of elements in the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值有效，且查找单个匹配项的尝试超过该超时间隔，则会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性来确定调用 方法是否找到了匹配项。The following example uses the property to determine whether the call to the method found any matches. 如果不是，则表示找不到匹配项。If not, it indicates that no matches were found. 否则，它会枚举匹配项，并显示它们的值以及在输入字符串中找到它们的位置。Otherwise, it enumerates the matches and displays their value and the position in the input string at which they were found. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/cs/countex1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/vb/countex1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 正则表达式模式 `\d+` 匹配输入字符串中的一个或多个十进制字符。The regular expression pattern `\d+` matches one or more decimal characters in an input string.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

summary.span: 提供一个循环访问集合的枚举器。

span.span: Provides an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

returns.span: 包含 中所有 对象的对象。

span.span: An object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是调用 方法来检索枚举器，该枚举数可用于循环访问集合中的 对象，而应使用组迭代构造（如和 `For Each`中C#的 `foreach` ...`Next`Instead of calling the method to retrieve an enumerator that lets you iterate through the objects in the collection, you should use the group iteration construct (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic）由编程语言提供。in Visual Basic) provided by your programming language. 使用 方法（或中C#的 `foreach` 语句，并`Next` 中的 `For Each`... Visual Basic 语句）来循环访问 对象的成员会导致正则表达式引擎使用延迟计算根据需要填充集合。Iterating the members of the object using the method (or the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 这类似于重复调用 方法，然后将生成的匹配项添加到 对象。This is analogous to repeatedly calling the method, and then adding the resulting match to the object. 与此相反，正则表达式引擎在访问 属性时使用直接计算一次填充集合。In contrast, the regular expression engine uses direct evaluation to populate the collection all at once when the property is accessed. 这种生成集合的方法比延迟计算要大得多。This can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 由于 对象通常是使用延迟计算来填充的，因此尝试导航到集合的下一个成员可能会引发 异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to the next member of the collection may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值有效，且尝试查找下一个匹配项，则会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find the next match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示集合是否为只读集合。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is read only.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只读集合不允许在创建集合后添加或删除元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created. 请注意，在此上下文中为只读并不表示是否可以修改集合中的单个元素，因为 接口仅支持添加和删除操作。Note that read-only in this context does not indicate whether individual elements of the collection can be modified, since the interface only supports addition and removal operations. 例如，强制转换或转换为 对象的数组的 属性返回 `true`，即使可以修改单个数组元素也是如此。For example, the property of an array that is cast or converted to an object returns `true`, even though individual array elements can be modified.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread-safe).
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]中不存在此成员。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果要开发面向 [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]的应用程序，请改用 属性。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the property instead.

param.name: i
param.span: 集合中的索引。

span.span: Index into the collection.

summary.span: 获取该集合的单个成员。

span.span: Gets an individual member of the collection.

value.span: 位于集合中 位置的捕获子字符串。

span.span: The captured substring at position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在C#中， 属性为索引器;它不是在代码中显式引用的，而是允许 集合作为数组进行访问。In C#, the property is an indexer; it is not explicitly referenced in code, but instead allows the collection to be accessed as if it were an array. 通常，只有在从 属性确定了集合中的总项数后，才能通过索引访问 对象中的单个项。Typically, individual items in the object are accessed by their index only after the total number of items in the collection has been determined from the property. 但是，访问 属性会导致正则表达式引擎使用直接计算一次生成全部集合。However, accessing the property causes the regular expression engine to use direct evaluation to build the collection all at once. 这通常比使用 方法、 C# `foreach` 语句或 Visual Basic `For Each`...`Next` 语句来循环访问集合更昂贵。This is typically more expensive than iterating the collection using the method, the C# `foreach` statement, or the Visual Basic `For Each`...`Next` statement. 由于 对象通常是使用延迟计算来填充的，因此尝试定位到特定的匹配项可能会引发 异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to a specific match may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值有效，并且查找特定匹配项的尝试超过该超时间隔，则会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a specific match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例分析了 Nathaniel Hawthorne 的*7 个 Gables*的第一句，并返回 对象，该对象包含以大写或小写 "h" 开头的所有单词。The following example parses the first sentence of Nathaniel Hawthorne's *House of the Seven Gables* and returns a object that contains all words that begin with either an uppercase or lowercase "h". 然后，使用 属性检索每个单词，并将其显示在控制台中。The property is then used to retrieve each word and display it to the console. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/cs/RegEx_24804.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/vb/RegEx_24804.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 此示例产生以下输出：The example produces the following output: ``` Half house huge ```

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than or equal to .

span.span: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的 提供通过公开 属性来循环访问集合的功能。您可以使用枚举器读取集合中的数据，但不能修改该集合。The returned provides the ability to iterate through the collection by exposing a property .You can use enumerators to read the data in a collection, but not to modify the collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 方法将枚举器推进到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 返回相同的对象，直到再次调用 时， 将 设置为下一个元素。 returns the same object until is called again as sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位到集合中的最后一个元素之后， 返回 `false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对 的后续调用也将返回 `false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果对的最后一个调用 返回 `false`，则 未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器的行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of the enumerator is undefined. 枚举器没有对集合的独占访问权限，因此只要集合保持不变，枚举数就会保持有效。An enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection so an enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行了更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器会失效，你可能会收到意外的结果。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is invalidated and you may get unexpected results. 此外，枚举集合不是线程安全的过程。Also, enumerating a collection is not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保线程安全，应在枚举器期间锁定集合，或在集合上实现同步。To guarantee thread-safety, you should lock the collection during enumerator or implement synchronization on the collection. 命名空间中集合的默认实现不会同步。Default implementations of collections in the namespace aren't synchronized.

span.span: The collection is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.
